synopsis: A hard-working way-too-cute dog and a scary-faced but lovable cat. Living with them makes every day fun. Their owner's days are filled with laughter and sentiment. Are you a cat-lover? A dog-lover? Or both? This anime is a present for the people out there who love both dogs and cats so much they can't choose.(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: With a Dog and a Cat, Every Day is Fun
title.jp: Inu to Neko Docchi mo Katteru to Mainichi Tanoshii
